thread.section_title: MOTORCYCLE SHIPPERS Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MOTORCYCLE SHIPPERS | motorcycleshippers.com
thread.title: Tim Powers
thread.title_full: MOTORCYCLE SHIPPERS reviewed by Tim Powers

author: Tim Powers
title: Tim Powers
text: I was a little anxious about having a motorcycle shipped from California to Texas. I've heard horror stories about bikes showing up damaged from those online sites that bid for your business based on extra space in a trailer. The salesman at my local dealer recommended Motorcycle Shippers as did some folks on a Guzzi forum so I checked them out. Here's what I found: the price was fair, the service was outstanding and the bike showed up in perfect condition. In fact, they went out of their way before and after the shipment to make sure my questions were answered and that I was satisfied. Perfect business model.
